cur.html:
안드로이드 스튜디오에서 코틀린을 사용해서 리싸이클러뷰를 작성하는 방법에 대해 기록

0. 환경 설정하기

Gradle Scripts → build.gradle(Module)에 아래 코드 추가하기

dependencies {
        implementation 'androidx.recyclerview:recyclerview:1.1.0'
}

1. item.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:layout_width="100dp"
    android:layout_height="145dp">
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/img"
        android:layout_width="90dp"
        android:layout_height="90dp"
        android:layout_margin="5dp"
        android:background="@color/gray"/>
    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:orientation="horizontal">

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/txtName"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
            android:gravity="center"
            android:layout_gravity="left"
            android:text="이름"
            android:textSize="10sp"/>
        <View
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="0dp"
            android:layout_weight="1"/>
        <CheckBox
            android:id="@+id/check_star"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
            android:layout_gravity="right"
            android:button="@null"
            android:drawableRight="@drawable/star"/>
    </LinearLayout>
    <LinearLayout
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:orientation="horizontal">
        <View
            android:layout_width="1dp"
            android:layout_height="9dp"
            android:layout_marginLeft="7dp"
            android:background="@drawable/line_a"/>
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/txtAddress"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:layout_marginLeft="2dp"
            android:gravity="center"
            android:text="주소"
            android:textSize="5sp"/>
    </LinearLayout>
    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginTop="4dp"
        android:layout_marginLeft="7dp">
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/txtTagNpc"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginRight="3dp"
            android:paddingVertical="0.5dp"
            android:paddingHorizontal="4dp"
            android:text="@string/npc"
            android:textAppearance="@style/tag"
            android:gravity="center_horizontal|center_vertical"
            android:background="@drawable/tag_npc"
            android:visibility="visible"
            />
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/txtTagCollection"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginRight="3dp"
            android:paddingVertical="0.5dp"
            android:paddingHorizontal="4dp"
            android:text="@string/collection"
            android:textAppearance="@style/tag"
            android:gravity="center_horizontal|center_vertical"
            android:background="@drawable/tag_collection"
            />
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/txtTagItem"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginRight="3dp"
            android:paddingVertical="0.5dp"
            android:paddingHorizontal="4dp"
            android:text="@string/item"
            android:textAppearance="@style/tag"
            android:gravity="center_horizontal|center_vertical"
            android:background="@drawable/tag_item"
            />
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/txtTagMarket"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginRight="3dp"
            android:paddingVertical="0.5dp"
            android:paddingHorizontal="4dp"
            android:text="@string/market"
            android:textAppearance="@style/tag"
            android:gravity="center_horizontal|center_vertical"
            android:background="@drawable/tag_market"
            />
    </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

2. style.kt

package com.example.projectex1

class bestPlaceStyle (
    var img: Int,
    var name:String,
    var address:String,
    var star: Boolean,
    var npc:Boolean,
    var collection:Boolean,
    var item:Boolean,
    var market:Boolean
    )

3. adapter.kt

import android.content.Context
import android.view.LayoutInflater
import android.view.View
import android.view.ViewGroup
import android.widget.CheckBox
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.TextView
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
import com.example.projectex1.R
import com.example.projectex1.bestPlaceStyle

class bestPlaceAdapter(val context: Context, val bestPlaceList: ArrayList<bestPlaceStyle>) :
    RecyclerView.Adapter<bestPlaceAdapter.Holder>() {
    override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): Holder {
        val view = LayoutInflater.from(context).inflate(R.layout.best_place_item, parent, false)
        return Holder(view)
    }

    override fun getItemCount(): Int {
        return bestPlaceList.size
    }

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: Holder, position: Int) {
        holder?.bind(bestPlaceList[position], context)
    }

    inner class Holder(itemView: View) : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(itemView) {
        val img: ImageView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.img)
        val txtName: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.txtName)
        val checkStar: CheckBox = itemView.findViewById(R.id.check_star)
        val txtAddress: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.txtAddress)
        val txtTagNpc: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.txtTagNpc)
        val txtTagCollection: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.txtTagCollection)
        val txtTagItem: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.txtTagItem)
        val txtTagMarker: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.txtTagMarket)


        fun bind (item: bestPlaceStyle, context: Context) {
            img.setImageResource(item.img)
            txtName.text = item.name
            if(item.star==true){ checkStar.isChecked=true }
            txtAddress.text=item.address
            if(item.npc==false){txtTagNpc.visibility=View.GONE}
            if(item.item==false){txtTagItem.visibility=View.GONE}
            if(item.collection==false){txtTagCollection.visibility=View.GONE}
            if(item.market==false){txtTagMarker.visibility=View.GONE}
        }
    }
}

4. main.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/bestPlaceList"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:orientation="horizontal"
        app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager"
        tools:listitem="@layout/best_place_item"/>

</LinearLayout>

리싸이클러뷰를 가로로 작성하려면 orientation을 horiaontal로 지정하면된다.

    android:orientation="horizontal"

tools를 통해 레이아웃 디자인 미리보기 페에지에서 작성해 놓은 아이템이 뜨는 것을 확인 할 수 있다.

    tools:listitem="@layout/best_place_item"

5.mainActivity.kt

package com.example.projectex1

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
import bestPlaceAdapter
import com.example.projectex1.databinding.ActivityMainBinding


class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    val binding by lazy { ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater) }
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        setContentView(binding.root);

        var placeList = arrayListOf<bestPlaceStyle>(
            bestPlaceStyle(R.drawable.ex1,"경복궁","서울",true,true,true,true,true),
            bestPlaceStyle(R.drawable.ex1,"경복궁2","서울",true,true,true,true,true),
            bestPlaceStyle(R.drawable.ex1,"경복궁2","서울",true,true,true,true,true),
            bestPlaceStyle(R.drawable.ex1,"경복궁2","서울",true,true,true,true,true)
        )
        val mAdapter = bestPlaceAdapter(this, placeList)
        binding.bestPlaceList.adapter = mAdapter

    }
}

뷰바인딩을 사용해서 main.xml의 리싸이클뷰 연결해주기(마지막 줄)
